title: End of season rewards for players who have been banned
body:
14 days ago, i got banned while i was on road to platinum, lost my nerves and for 3 matches i was very toxic and i got banned.
After that i played on some other accoutns and realised that this game is about cooperating and being sportsmanlike.
When today i got unbanned i went from g1 50 lp to platinum winning all games, and here is my question:
If i get banned do i get the platinum loading screeen border? bc thats why i mainly tried to get that rank.
I am reformed and i am ready to be sportsmanlike

replies.body: In the past, the general rule has been that you cannot have any penalties **within 3 months of the season ending** I believe. Since the end of the season hasn't been officially announced quite yet, the "deadline" so to speak is still a bit hard to pinpoint.
